channel.title: Ballot Result Radio
channel.itunes:author: DJ Ben
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ballot Result Radio is a show on KPSU showcasing punk, hardcore, pop-punk and melodic hardcore, Wednesdays at 8PM on kpsu.org
channel.itunes:summary: Each week Ballot Result features new punk music from across the spectrum. Regularly appearing on the show are both local and national punk acts, and you can find videos of our in-studio performances on http://www.facebook.com/ballotresult

item.title: Ballot Result Radio Episode 0055: 12/05/2012
item.description: This week’s show features new music from MEAN JEANS, COMADRE, THE LOSS, JEFF ROSENSTOCK, TOY LOVE and GREAT LAKES.
item.itunes:author: Ben
item.itunes:subtitle: This week’s show features new music from MEAN JEANS, COMADRE, THE LOSS, JEFF ROSENSTOCK, TOY LOVE and GREAT LAKES.
item.itunes:summary: This week’s show features new music from MEAN JEANS, COMADRE, THE LOSS, JEFF ROSENSTOCK, TOY LOVE and GREAT LAKES.
item.itunes:keywords: punk, punk rock, portland, hardcore, post-punk, melodic hardcore, pop-punk
